# orbit-db-io
> IO helper module used within OrbitDB

[![Gitter](https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/nwjs/nw.js.svg)](https://gitter.im/orbitdb/Lobby)

## Install

This project uses [npm](http://npmjs.com/) and [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/).
```sh
npm i orbit-db-io
```
